products.title: Acacia Buttercup
products.description: Min width: 200mm max width: 3000mm (1940mm fabric turned) min drop: 300mm max drop: 1690mm (3000mm fabric turned) fabric joins: if the width is greater than 1940mm and the drop is greater than 1690mm, a horizontal join will be required positioned towards the top of the blind. products.title: Acacia Cream
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm & 127mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
